attributes.action: Update the process of calling an election - take it outside of government.
attributes.background: The government is unable to call an election. Parliament can call one. Parliament doesn't necessarily act in the interest of "the people".

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

You might like to sign one of these petitions:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/272911
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/268888
